text: Hillary for America Spokesman Nick Merrill released the following statement on news reports regarding cyber hacksВ targeted at the campaign:"An analytics data program maintained by the DNC, and used by our campaign and a number of other entities, was accessed as part of the DNC hack. Our campaign computer system has been under review by outside cyber security experts. To date, they have found no evidence that our internal systems have been compromised."
title: Hillary for America Statement on Recent Reports of Cyber Hacks
